import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' function About() { return (

About

Pentland Renewable (PELREN) is an innovative initiative of Pentland Energy Limited ( PEL)-A Nigerian Engineering Procurement and Construction ( EPC) company to address current global sustainable issues with a focus on the African Markets . Key element of the SDG goal – Goal 1 –No Poverty , Goal 3- Good Health and Well being , Goal 5 – Gender Equality , Goal 7- Affordable and Clean Energy and Goal 17 – Climate action , is key to the execution of this initiative. Our belief is that access to electricity is crucial for the economic development and a key to escape poverty. Without electricity, rural communities and sub – urban areas uses other energy sources such as kerosene, charcoal, candles or other fossil fueled solutions to cook and power their homes. These solutions poses great danger to the people and environment in terms of global warming and deforestation. It also proven that they are more expensive in the long term . Most people without power distribution lines are living in rural areas. The extension of the grid gets expensive outside the urban areas, and an offgrid solution cum solar home system could be effective in ensuring sustainable economic communities . This is where PELREN comes in , providing renewable energy solutions that creates economic markets for sustainable living within the communities . Starting with the Nigerian markets, our goal is to reachout to other African countries within a very short period , thereby ensuring our impact is Pan- African
) } export default About const Wrapper = styled.div` display: grid; grid-template-columns: auto; .about { display: flex; justify-content: center; } `
